## Project thoughts

I am interested in the fields of environmental science, sustainability, and how these fields relate to policy, economics, and markets. By collecting data of investments made by Congress-people over the last two decades, I would like to see how party affiliation may influence the types of companies that politicians invest in, especially with regards to the sustainability of these investments.
